name: Progeny Task79 - Modular Position Fusion System
description: A sensor-agnostic and platform-agnostic ROS package for position data fusion, designed to combine inputs from multiple sensors for robust, accurate estimation. Ideal for robotics and multi-sensor navigation platforms.

name: Bio-Inspired Rhythmic Locomotion with Quadruped Robot
description: Demonstrates a rhythm generator that naturally stimulates periodic motor patterns within reinforcement learning frameworks. Built using Stable-Baselines3 and Isaac Lab to enable robotics research on rhythmic locomotion in Python.

name: SAGE - Smart Access & Governance Engine
description: A LangChain + LLM framework with PostgreSQL backend for automating role mining and access management workflows, reducing manual review time by over 50%. Features a FastAPI-based IAM chatbot supporting database queries, automated reporting, and admin actions such as password resets and access provisioning.

name: AI LinkedIn Job Application Bot
description: Automates LinkedIn Easy Apply end-to-end: locates jobs, answers application questions using AI over your PDFs and notes, and logs everything in DuckDB. Focuses on reliability, concise responses, and seamless extensibility.

name: Bottube
description: Bottube scrapes Reddit posts, uses AI to craft and voice stories, generates visuals, produces a video, and uploads directly to YouTube. Integrates multiple AI models and media pipelines for seamless automated content creation.

name: Project Jobs
description: Automated bot for logging job applications from Gmail, recruiter spam, and rejections into a spreadsheet. Integrates Gmail API, Google Sheets, and supports LLM-powered parsing (Ollama/ChatGPT), giving you clarity and organization in your job search.
